attributes.action: Change The Road Traffic (New Drivers) Act 1995
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
According to this act if 6 penalty points are reached within the first to years of passing a Standard Driving test the Driving Licence Will be revoked.
There are many drivers who have been driving for years and comit more driving o-ffences than new drivers, but where they can reach 12 points where they can be banned a new drivier who has made 2 mistakes and has been caught has lost their licence and then have to spend at least £100 trying to get their licence back. It seems highly unfair.
